column4: i just got an atheros 5008 and not recognized by my computer- bios says no
is there a way around this or will i have to get a new comp to make it work
you may need to use ndiswrapper but its not hard, just need to know your chip in your wireless
the thing is when its installed i cant boot into any thing or access the bios, its not recognized by the bios and the bios stops all with it installed
